Title: Seven Sundays
Writer: Vanessa R. Valdez (story), Roumella Monge (story), Kiko Abrillo (story), Roumella Monge (screenplay), Kiko Abrillo (screenplay), John Raphael Gonzaga (screenplay)
Actors: Ronaldo Valdez, Aga Muhlach, Dingdong Dantes, Enrique Gil
Plot: The Bonifacio siblings reunite when they find out their father is diagnosed with cancer. In the process, they have to deal with unresolved issues among themselves before it's too late.
